instructions: Given the ‘eventfiles_table.csv’ file from https://huggingface.co/datasets/StevenDillmann/chandra_xray_eventfiles, reproduce the 2D-PCA embedding space from the paper: 1) Build the E-t maps (2D eventfile representations) as detailed in the paper (normalize the histogram values here). 2) Apply PCA with 15 components (feature extraction). 3) Apply tsne with given hyperparameters in the paper (dimensionality reduction). 4) Store the resulting embedding vectors under in the file 2DPCA_embedding.csv with the columns tsne1, tsne2, obsreg_id. 5) Submit only the full path to the file.
